effect.diamond_pearl: User faints. Its replacement’s HP and PP are fully restored, and any major status effect is removed.
effect.platinum: User faints. Its replacement’s HP and PP are fully restored, and any major status effect is removed.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: User faints. Its replacement’s HP and PP are fully restored, and any major status effect is removed.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: User faints, and its replacement is fully healed.
short_effect.platinum: User faints, and its replacement is fully healed.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: User faints, and its replacement is fully healed.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its status and HP fully restored.
flavor_text.platinum: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its status and HP fully restored.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its status and HP fully restored.
